00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief PS/2 mouse driver.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_mouse.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_mouse(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input           clk_30,
00035     input           reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name drv_keyboard interface

00039     //% @{
00040     output reg      mouse_moved,
00041     output [8:0]    mouse_y_move,
00042     output [8:0]    mouse_x_move,
00043     output          mouse_left_button,
00044     output          mouse_right_button,
00045     output          mouse_middle_button,
00046     //% @}
00047     
00048     //% \name PS/2 mouse hardware interface

00049     //% @{
00050     inout           ps2_mouseclk,
00051     inout           ps2_mousedat
00052     //% @}
00053 );
00054 assign ps2_mouseclk = (send_counter >= 12'd1 && send_counter < 12'd4000) ? 1'b0 : 1'bZ;
00055 assign ps2_mousedat = (send_counter >= 12'd4000 && send_counter <= 12'd4009) ? send_shift[0] : 1'bZ;
00056 
00057 reg [15:0] mv;
00058 reg mv_wait;
00059 reg was_ps2_mouseclk;
00060 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00061     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00062         mv                  <= 16'd0;
00063         mv_wait             <= 1'b0;
00064         was_ps2_mouseclk    <= 1'b0;
00065     end
00066     else begin
00067         mv <= { mv[14:0], ps2_mouseclk };
00068     
00069         if(mv_wait == 1'b0 && mv[15:12] == 4'b1111 && mv[3:0] == 4'b0000) begin
00070             was_ps2_mouseclk <= 1'b1;
00071             mv_wait <= 1'b1;
00072         end
00073         else if(mv_wait == 1'b1 && mv[15:0] == 16'h0000) begin
00074             mv_wait <= 1'b0;
00075             was_ps2_mouseclk <= 1'b0;
00076         end
00077         else begin
00078             was_ps2_mouseclk <= 1'b0;
00079         end
00080     end
00081 end
00082 
00083 reg [11:0] send_counter;
00084 reg [9:0] send_shift;
00085 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00086     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00087         send_counter    <= 12'd0;
00088         send_shift      <= 10'd0;
00089     end
00090     else if(send_start == 1'b1) begin
00091         send_counter <= 12'd1;
00092         send_shift <= send_contents;
00093     end
00094     else if(send_counter > 12'd0 && send_counter < 12'd4000) begin
00095         send_counter <= send_counter + 12'd1;
00096     end
00097     else if(send_counter >= 12'd4000 && send_counter <= 12'd4009 && was_ps2_mouseclk == 1'b1) begin
00098         send_counter <= send_counter + 12'd1;
00099         if(send_counter <= 12'd4007) begin
00100             send_shift <= { send_shift[9] ^ send_shift[0], 1'b0, send_shift[8:1] };
00101         end
00102         else if(send_counter == 12'd4008) begin
00103             send_shift <= { 9'd0, send_shift[9] ^ send_shift[0] };
00104         end
00105     end
00106     else if(send_counter == 12'd4010 && was_ps2_mouseclk == 1'b1) begin
00107         if(ps2_mousedat == 1'b0) send_counter <= send_counter + 12'd1;
00108     end
00109     else if(send_counter == 12'd4011 && ps2_mouseclk == 1'b1 && ps2_mousedat == 1'b1) begin
00110         send_counter <= 12'd0;
00111     end
00112 end
00113 
00114 reg send_start;
00115 reg [9:0] send_contents;
00116 reg [23:0] ctrl_counter;
00117 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00118     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00119         send_start      <= 1'b0;
00120         send_contents   <= 10'd0;
00121         ctrl_counter    <= 24'd0;
00122     end
00123     else if(ctrl_counter < 24'hFFFFF0) begin
00124         ctrl_counter <= ctrl_counter + 16'd1;
00125     end
00126     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFF0) begin
00127         send_contents <= { 1'b1, 8'hF4, 1'b0 };
00128         send_start <= 1'b1;
00129         ctrl_counter <= ctrl_counter + 24'd1;
00130     end
00131     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFF1) begin
00132         send_start <= 1'b0;
00133         ctrl_counter <= ctrl_counter + 24'd1;
00134     end
00135     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFF2 && send_counter == 12'd0) begin
00136         ctrl_counter <= ctrl_counter + 24'd1;
00137     end
00138     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFF3 && new_ps2 == 1'b1 && mousedat[8:1] == 8'hFA) begin
00139         ctrl_counter <= 24'hFFFFFF;
00140     end
00141     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFFF && (mousedat_timeout == 24'hFFFFFF || movement_timeout == 24'hFFFFFF)) begin
00142         ctrl_counter <= 24'h0;
00143     end
00144 end
00145 
00146 wire new_ps2;
00147 assign new_ps2 = (was_ps2_mouseclk == 1'b1 && mousedat_counter == 4'd10 && mousedat[0] == 1'b0 && ps2_mousedat == 1'b1 && mousedat_parity == 1'b1);
00148 
00149 reg [9:0] mousedat;
00150 reg [3:0] mousedat_counter;
00151 reg [23:0] mousedat_timeout;
00152 reg mousedat_parity;
00153 
00154 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00155     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00156         mousedat            <= 10'd0;
00157         mousedat_counter    <= 4'd0;
00158         mousedat_parity     <= 1'b0;
00159         mousedat_timeout    <= 24'd0;
00160     end
00161     else if(ctrl_counter >= 24'hFFFFF3 && mousedat_timeout != 24'hFFFFFF) begin
00162     
00163         if(mousedat_counter != 4'd0)        mousedat_timeout <= mousedat_timeout + 24'd1;
00164         else if(mousedat_counter == 4'd0)   mousedat_timeout <= 24'd0;
00165         
00166         if(was_ps2_mouseclk == 1'b1) begin
00167             mousedat <= { ps2_mousedat, mousedat[9:1] };
00168             
00169             if(mousedat_counter == 4'd10) begin
00170                 mousedat_counter <= 4'd0;
00171             end
00172             else begin
00173                 mousedat_counter <= mousedat_counter + 4'd1;
00174                 if(mousedat_counter == 4'd0)   mousedat_parity <= 1'b0;
00175                 else if(ps2_mousedat == 1'b1)  mousedat_parity <= ~mousedat_parity;
00176             end
00177         end
00178     end
00179     else begin
00180         mousedat            <= 10'd0;
00181         mousedat_counter    <= 4'd0;
00182         mousedat_parity     <= 1'b0;
00183         mousedat_timeout    <= 24'd0;
00184     end
00185 end
00186 
00187 assign mouse_y_move = (movement[23] == 1'b0)? { movement[21], movement[7:0] }  : 9'd0;
00188 assign mouse_x_move = (movement[22] == 1'b0)? { movement[20], movement[15:8] }  : 9'd0;
00189 assign mouse_left_button    = movement[16];
00190 assign mouse_right_button   = movement[17];
00191 assign mouse_middle_button  = movement[18];
00192 
00193 reg [1:0] movement_counter;
00194 reg [23:0] movement;
00195 reg [23:0] movement_timeout;
00196 
00197 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00198     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00199         movement_counter    <= 2'd0;
00200         movement            <= 24'd0;
00201         mouse_moved         <= 1'b0;
00202         movement_timeout    <= 24'd0;
00203     end
00204     else if(ctrl_counter == 24'hFFFFFF && movement_timeout != 24'hFFFFFF) begin
00205         
00206         if(movement_counter != 4'd0)        movement_timeout <= movement_timeout + 24'd1;
00207         else if(movement_counter == 4'd0)   movement_timeout <= 24'd0;
00208         
00209         if(mouse_moved == 1'b1) mouse_moved <= 1'b0;
00210         
00211         if(new_ps2 == 1'b1) begin
00212             movement <= { movement[15:0], mousedat[8:1] };
00213             if(movement_counter == 2'd2) begin
00214                 movement_counter <= 2'd0;
00215                 
00216                 if(movement[11] == 1'b1)    mouse_moved <= 1'b1;
00217                 else                        movement_timeout <= 24'hFFFFFF;
00218             end
00219             else movement_counter <= movement_counter + 2'd1;
00220         end
00221     end
00222     else begin
00223         movement_counter    <= 2'd0;
00224         movement            <= 24'd0;
00225         mouse_moved         <= 1'b0;
00226         movement_timeout    <= 24'd0;
00227     end
00228 end
00229 
00230 endmodule
